tag_list: aditive, operations, about, travelocity, advertising, social-media, crm
overview:
Derek Moulaison is the Senior Director of Advertising Operations & Product Management, responsible for operations for ad products and client services, and the ADITIVE product development portfolio. Prior to ADITIVE, Derek lead ad operations and built interactive advertising infrastructure and innovative media product for some of the web’s biggest brands including DoubleClick, About.com, and Travelocity.

Derek is a graduate of the University of California at Berkeley.

relationships.title: Director of Advertising Operations and Product Management
